front.title: Minimal Packetization Layer Path MTU Discovery for IP/*/IPv4 Tunnels

abstract.t: The nominal Maximum Transmission Unit (MTU) of the Internet hasbecome 1500 bytes, but existing IP/*/IPv4 tunneling mechanisms imposean encapsulation overhead that can reduce the effective path MTU tosmaller values. Additionally, existing IP/*/IPv4 tunnelingmechanisms are limited in their ability to discover and utilizelarger MTUs. This document specifies minimal mechanisms forconveying packets over IP/*/IPv4 tunnels that address these issues.
